sentences.en: Ah, the pomposity of his tone , the bluster, the arrogance.
sentences.cn: 啊, 他那巧舌如簧, 那咆哮, 那傲慢.

sentences.en: He always tries to bluster his way out of difficult situations.
sentences.cn: 他总是自吹自擂以摆脱困境.

sentences.en: He was awakened by the bluster of their preparations.
sentences.cn: 他被他们做准备工作的吵闹声吵醒了.

sentences.en: He was inclined to bluster at first, but he soon dropped.
sentences.cn: 起初他老爱吵闹一阵, 可是不久就不做声了.

sentences.en: He was not at ease with me, and much of his bluster rose from timidity.
sentences.cn: 和我在一起他就不自在, 他的吵嚷大都是由于怯懦.

sentences.en: His bluster sank to sullenness under her look.
sentences.cn: 在她目光逼视下,他蛮横的表情稍加收敛,显出一副阴沉的样子.

sentences.en: How is it possible to bargain with shopkeepers who bluff and bluster?
sentences.cn: 面对虚张声势的商家,如何讨个好价钱?

sentences.en: I wasn't frightened by what he said it was just bluster.
sentences.cn: 他说的话吓不倒我--不过是雷声大,雨点小.

sentences.en: Much of his bluster rose from timidity.
sentences.cn: 他的吵嚷大都是由于怯懦.

sentences.en: Of course, his bluster was directed against me as well.
sentences.cn: 当然, 他指桑骂槐,矛头是针对我的.

sentences.en: There was a bluster and zest in Anthony.
sentences.cn: 安东尼身上有一种疯狂和热情.

sentences.en: We could hear the bluster of the wind and rain.
sentences.cn: 我们能听到狂风暴雨的吹打声.

sentences.en: We do not believe their nice word nor areintimidated by their bluster.
sentences.cn: 我们既不相信他们的甜言蜜语,也不怕他们的恐吓威胁.

sentences.en: We shall never be cowed by the bluster of reactionaries.
sentences.cn: 我们决不会被反动派的气势汹汹所吓倒.

sentences.en: Why don't you take you and your bluster the hell out of here?
sentences.cn: 你干吗不闭上鸟嘴从这滚出去?

words.tran_cn: 咆哮的；叫嚷的；狂吹的；虚张声势的
咆哮；狂吹；夸口；威吓；气势汹汹地说

trans.tran_cn: 虚张声势地恫吓； 猛刮
咆哮，威吓，怒冲冲地说，狂吹，夸口
